whatIsService.title: What Is Mesotherapy / MesoFacial?
whatIsService.content:
Mesotherapy, also called MesoFacial when used for the face, is a minimally invasive skin rejuvenation treatment that delivers a customised blend of vitamins, antioxidants, peptides, and hyaluronic acid directly into the middle layer of the skin (mesoderm).

Unlike topical skincare, which only works on the surface, mesotherapy nourishes skin cells from within stimulating collagen, improving circulation, and enhancing hydration.

At The Skin Firm, we offer both classic mesotherapy injections and non-invasive MesoFacial protocols, depending on your comfort level and goals. Both treatments leave your skin looking fresher, smoother, and more radiant.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Mesotherapy at The Skin Firm?
whyChooseUs.description:
Sometimes facials or creams are not enough to repair and rejuvenate the skin. If your skin feels tired, dull, or prematurely aged, mesotherapy offers a deeper, medical-grade solution.

At The Skin Firm, mesotherapy is performed under the care of Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh, ensuring your treatment is safe, personalised, and effective. With high-quality serums, advanced delivery systems, and customised protocols, we help you achieve long-lasting glow and skin repair.

questions.question: How is mesotherapy different from regular facials?
questions.answer: Facials work on the surface, while mesotherapy delivers nutrients deeper into the skin for longer-lasting results.

questions.question: Is mesotherapy painful?
questions.answer: Mild discomfort may occur, but numbing cream makes the procedure very comfortable.

questions.question: How long does one session of mesotherapy treatment take?
When will I see results after my mesotherapy treatment?
questions.answer: A healthy glow appears within a week, with improved tone and texture after 2–3 sessions.

questions.question: How many sessions of mesotherapy treatment are needed?
questions.answer: Usually 3-6 sessions are spaced 3-4 weeks apart, followed by maintenance every few months.

questions.question: Is MesoFacial needle-free?
questions.answer: Yes MesoFacial uses infusion technology without injections, ideal for those who prefer a gentler option.

questions.question: Can mesotherapy help with pigmentation?
questions.answer: Yes, brightening mesotherapy protocols specifically target uneven tone and pigmentation.

questions.question: Are results from mesotherapy treatment permanent?
questions.answer: Skin quality improves long-term, but maintenance is advised to keep results fresh.

questions.question: Can men also get mesotherapy?
questions.answer: Absolutely many men choose it for hydration, glow, and anti-ageing benefits.

questions.question: Is there downtime?
questions.answer: Minimal only mild redness or swelling for 1-2 days.
